name: Creatures Design V1
description:
This is a Lora Model to generate cratures and monsters!

For better results use a sizes between 512x and 600x, then you can upscale it and with CLIP SKIP of 3 or 2

to trigger the style you need to began the prompt with. "A fantz creature, ....." then after you can be creative with.

I use this template to get good generation results:

Prompt examples:
1 - A fantz creature|animal design, ultra detailed, <lora:CreaturesDesignV1:.9>

Negative Prompt:
1- (deformed, distorted, disfigured:1.3), poorly drawn, bad anatomy, wrong anatomy, extra limb, missing limb, floating limbs, (mutated hands and fingers:1.4), disconnected limbs, mutation, mutated, disgusting, blurry, amputation<lora:nartfixer:1> <lora:nfixer:1>

meta.prompt: A fantz monster design, ultra detailed,   <lora:CreaturesDesignV1:1>
meta.negativePrompt: (deformed, distorted, disfigured:1.3), poorly drawn, bad anatomy, wrong anatomy, extra limb, missing limb, floating limbs, (mutated hands and fingers:1.4), disconnected limbs, mutation, mutated, disgusting, blurry, amputation
